entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 5.
